abstract: Citigroup agreed to pay $978,000 to settle a New Jersey investigation into accusations that it failed to supervise two brokers whose trading strategies cost clients, including many older customers, more than $3 million, state regulators said Monday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup agreed to pay $978,000 to settle a New Jersey investigation into accusations that it failed to supervise two brokers whose trading strategies cost clients, including many older customers, more than $3 million, state regulators said Monday.
